title: Fix habits not loading in latest draft

requirements.text: Fix the habits data fetching so that habits load correctly on the HabitsPage. Investigate and resolve any broken query, actor initialization, or data-fetching issue in useQueries.ts or HabitList.tsx that prevents habits from appearing in the latest build.

quotes: Habits are not loading on the new draft

acceptanceCriteria: When a logged-in user navigates to the Habits page, their habits are fetched and displayed without errors.
The HabitList component renders HabitCard entries for all habits returned by the backend.
No loading spinner or empty state is shown indefinitely when habits exist in the backend.
The useHabits query (or equivalent) successfully resolves and populates the habits list.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not change the backend data model or existing canister methods.
nonGoals: Adding new habit features or UI changes unrelated to the loading bug.
Modifying backend logic unless the root cause is confirmed to be a backend issue.
